summary: GAO's work yielded $62.7 billion in financial benefits for the federal government in FY 2025. Our work improved the efficiency and effectiveness of federal programs and informed key legislative decisions. For example, provisions in the One Big Beautiful Bill Act require: New limits on how states use taxes to fund their share of Medicaid costs—saving an estimated $191 billion in the next decade A system...
title: Performance and Accountability Report, Fiscal Year 2025
